Reptile Rondo

Dear Diary,

Today I went to Art’s “Happy Together” Reptile Supplies.

On the counter by the register, I found some unusual sheet music.

When I asked Art about it, he said it was a gift from a friend. Apparently there was something ‘reptile-coded’ about these songs. I know he likes to keep the reptiles in his shop in alphabetical order, but he doesn’t know a lick of Latin.

I think I might play it for my pets Guido van Rossum and Yertle when I get home.

There even seem to be warm-up scales!

❮ ❯
